forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 9 to 14 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 65 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 9 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

weather_report:
In the dimming light of early evening, Downtown San Francisco rests beneath a veil of mostly cloudy skies, with a gentle wind whispering through the streets. The air, carrying a mild chill, will settle tonight around a comfortable 57 degrees, while the spirited west-southwest wind, fluttering around 9 to 14 mph, keeps the atmosphere alive. As night deepens, this initial veil may harbor more than just clouds; hints of fog weave through the city, elegantly cushioning the contours of the skyline, leaving the iconic Golden Gate partially shrouded, inviting curiosity yet retaining an air of mystery.

Tomorrow promises transformation, with the sun poised to rise and stretch its golden fingers across the horizon, coaxing the layer of fog to retreat. Expect a cheerful day ahead, where temperatures will rise to the mid-60s, a perfect backdrop for striding onto the streets invigorated by the rhythm of a bustling city. A light jacket or pullover will serve well against the residual coolness of the morning, but as the sun warms the atmosphere, layers can be shed like a second skin. For the intrepid explorers, a leisurely walk through Golden Gate Park or a stroll along the Embarcadero could offer a delightful escape, all while the coast casts a gentle allure. Whether you choose to embrace the city's vibrant cafés or take in the splendid views from one of its many hills, the day presents an opportunity to immerse oneself in the pulse of San Francisco, where every street unfurls a new story waiting to be discovered.
